name: The Chest 2
description:
The Chest 2

An ancient and mysterious chest lays dormant in the middle of a vast field.. what secrets could it hold? - WASD or ARROW keys to move - CLICK or SPACE to attack - Toggle music and sound effects with the buttons in the top right Can you get all the badges?

The Chest  - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/21932615

Credits

-Inspired by 'upgrade games', Coinbox hero and Open That Chest! (by @shadowspear1)

-Music is "Second Wind - Outdoors" from Newgrounds
